title: ASIC Engineer, Performance Architect

We are looking for talented individuals with deep experience that spans one or more of the key areas required to build successful world-class complex SoC and IP for data center applications.
salary: US$262,000/year to US$334,000/year + bonus + equity + benefits
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 18+ years of experience in designing and delivering performance architectures for compute and graphics SOCs Performance tuning for complex compute IPs Experience in Cycle Accurate Performance modeling.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in CPU, Graphics, NOC, Memory and Peripheral Subsystems Experience with ML workloads and architectures Master’s or PhD degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or related areas
responsibilities: Performance Architecture and Modeling for Accelerators Architecture exploration for compute Accelerators Micro-architecture development Collaboration with Design, verification and emulation teams in test plan development and debug Collaboration with compiler teams to deliver industry leading performance for the accelerators.
